column1: In addition to giving a historical perspective on HTLV - 1 and other retrovirus research, this paper discusses the origin of HTLV - 1; the modes of transmission and global epidemiology of HTLV - 1 infection; the genome of HTLV - 1 and the mechanism of HTLV - 1 - induced leukemogenesis; the role of HTLV - 1 in other diseases, and recent breakthroughs in ATL therapy.
